headlines.description: Liverpool strengthened their hold on top of the Premier League as Giorginio Wijnaldum and Roberto Firmino fired them to a 2-1 win vs. Tottenham.

video.headline: Tottenham 1-2 Liverpool: Firmino's goal seals three points

tracking.trackingName: Tottenham 1-2 Liverpool: Firmino's goal seals three points

headlines.shortLinkText: Wijnaldum, Firmino strike as Liverpool top Spurs

headlines.description: Ryan Fraser scored twice as Bournemouth claimed a 4-2 victory over Leicester City at the Vitality Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fraser doubles as Bournemouth beat Leicester

video.headline: Bournemouth 4-2 Leicester City: In-form Fraser shines

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE Bournemouth 4-2 Leicester City: In-form Fraser shines

headlines.description: A hat trick from Eden Hazard gave Chelsea their fifth win in five games, a 4-1 victory over Cardiff that sent them to the top of the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hazard's hat trick vs. Cardiff sends Chelsea top

video.headline: Chelsea 4-1 Cardiff City: Hazard hat trick keeps Blues perfect

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE Chelsea 4-1 Cardiff City: Hazard hat trick keeps Blues perfect

headlines.description: Wilfried Zaha underlined his importance to Crystal Palace by scoring the only goal in their 1-0 win at Huddersfield Town, ending their losing run.

video.headline: Huddersfield 0-1 Crystal Palace: Zaha inspires Palace win

tracking.trackingName: Huddersfield 0-1 Crystal Palace: Zaha inspires Palace win

headlines.shortLinkText: Zaha returns to inspire Palace at Huddersfield

headlines.description: Manchester City comfortably defeated Fulham 3-0 at the Etihad Stadium on Saturday to stay within two points of leaders Liverpool and Chelsea.
headlines.shortLinkText: City keep in touch with leaders with win

video.headline: Man City 3-0 Fulham: Sane scores as City canter

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE Man City 3-0 Fulham: Sane scores as City canter

headlines.description: A free kick by Granit Xhaka and a goal by Mesut Ozil gave Arsenal a 2-1 win at Newcastle United despite a stuttering first-half performance.
headlines.shortLinkText: Xhaka cracker helps Arsenal to win at Newcastle

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE Newcastle 1-2 Arsenal: Ozil lifts Gunners

headlines.description: Manchester United ruined Watford's first perfect start to a Premier League season with a 2-1 victory at Vicarage Road on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lukaku, Smalling end Watford's perfect start

video.headline: Watford 1-2 Man United: Reds hang on

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE Watford 1-2 Man United: Reds hang on
